site.description: Update site for AST View. DEPRECATED SITE, USE http://www.eclipse.org/jdt/ui/update-site FOR NEW UPDATES.

category-def.name: ast-view-1.0.9
category-def.label: AST View for 3.1
category-def.description:
DEPRECATED SITE, USE http://www.eclipse.org/jdt/ui/update-site FOR NEW UPDATES. View to visualize the Java compilers abstract syntax tree generated for a Java file.
Use this version Eclipse 3.1 and higher

category-def.name: java-element-view-1.0.0
category-def.label: JavaElement View (requires Java 5.0)
category-def.description: DEPRECATED SITE, USE http://www.eclipse.org/jdt/ui/update-site FOR NEW UPDATES. View to visualize IJavaElement and IResource handles in the Eclpse SDK. This feature requires Java 5.0.
